Title: Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts
Notes: "Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts" (地震灾害与减灾科普挂图) is a 12-poster series published in 1992 by the National Seismological Administration.Entitled "Strengthen defenses in case of earthquake emergency" (临震应急 强化防御), the poster shows preventive relief measures: stocking up on disaster relief materials.
